channel.title: Jonathan Sacerdoti at The Spectator
channel.description: Latest articles by Jonathan Sacerdoti from The Spectator

item.title: Activist silence over Sudan speaks volumes
item.description: Forces that mobilized over Gaza have, in the case of atrocities being committed in Sudan, fallen almost entirely silent

item.title: BBC editor accuses Trump of dishonesty – wrecking broadcaster’s impartiality
item.description: Jeremy Bowen, the BBC’s international editor, has a history of misreporting

item.title: Israeli Embassy terror suspect formed by hard-left and BLM
item.description: The far-left has absorbed the theological and conspiratorial architecture of Islamic antisemitism

item.title: The ICC’s moral reckoning over sex abuse claims
item.description: Chief prosecutor is accused of horrifying personal misconduct
